channel.title: www.fast.design on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in www.fast.design on Chege's Blog

item.title: Browse Page
item.description: When a user lands at /browse, this UI is shown. A couple of components seem to emerge: search-bar, tags-list, card-results, and mini-card. <search-bar> Currently, this is rendered by search_bar_dropdown.ejs, a partial that that is included in both /home and /browse. The fact that there it has JS, no server-delivered content, and has CSS makes it a good candidate for a web component. Revving up search-bar.ts. Ran into Uncaught TypeError: Class constructor s cannot be invoked without 'new' on the export class SearchBar extends LitElement line.
